data.actual_result: Account Settings and User Settings close, returning you to your last text channel/message
data.expected_result: Account Settings should close, returning you to User Settings
data.short_description: Tapping 'Done' on the keyboard in Account Settings will exit you out of your settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Open User Settings - Tap 'Account' - Tap on the 'Password' text field - Tap 'Done' on your keyboard
